title: Razor Ornata (experts)
body:
I just recently brought a razor ornata keyboard and have installed it however it doesn't type or so anything apart from light up?

anyone else had this problem?

replies.body: Odd, I have an Ornata and it did everything a normal keyboard would do straight out of the box + the standard cycle lighting till I adjusted all that in Synapse. Does your Synapse recognise it? Does your computer even recognise it? It's possible it's a defective, or it could be the USB port you are using or some such.

that's what you get for buying razer lmao.

anyway, why ask a league of legends forum? you'd be better off googling it or asking razer themselves.
